dialogueTree.title: Visual Calculus: "Wait, stop -- that man, bloated bey..."
dialogueTree.english: Wait, stop -- that man, bloated beyond all recognition, was 42?
dialogueTree.polish: Zaraz, czekaj. Ten napuchnięty do granic możliwości mężczyzna miał 42 lata?
dialogueTree.belarusian: Пачакай, гэты мужчына, які надзімаўся да крайнасцяў, меў 42 гады?

links.title: You: "It's what she said, yes."
links.english: It's what she said, yes.
links.polish: Tak, tak twierdziła.
links.belarusian: Так, так сцвярджала.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "Below the damage, the weeks of deco..."
links.english: Below the damage, the weeks of decomposition, all the swollen indignity of mortality -- he was 42 years old?
links.polish: Pod tą warstwą zniszczeń tkanki, tygodni rozkładu, napuchniętego upokorzenia śmiertelnością... miał 42 lata?
links.belarusian: Пад гэтай пластоўкай разбурэнняў тканін, тыдняў раскладу, надзіманага прыніжэння смяротнасцю... яму было 42 гады?

links.title: You: "Where is this going?"
links.english: Where is this going?
links.polish: Do czego to zmierza?
links.belarusian: Да чаго гэта вядзе?

links.title: Visual Calculus: "How old are *you*? That's where thi..."
links.english: How old are *you*? That's where this is going. Forty-five thousand litres of raw alcohol has left its disfigurements. What lies beneath, you wonder.
links.polish: Ile lat masz *ty*? Oto do czego to zmierza. Czterdzieści pięć tysięcy litrów alkoholu zniekształciło ci rysy. I zastanawiasz się, co kryje się pod tą powłoką.
links.belarusian: Колькі гадоў *табе*? Вось да чаго гэта ідзе. Сорак пяць тысяч літраў спіртнога знявечылі твае рысы. І ты задумваешся, што хаваецца пад гэтай абалонкай.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "You could ask either one of them."
links.english: You could ask either one of them.
links.polish: Możesz spytać którekolwiek z nich.
links.belarusian: Вы можаце спытаць каго заўгодна з іх.

links.title: You: ""Kim, how old do you think I am?""
links.english: "Kim, how old do you think I am?"
links.polish: „Kim, jak sądzisz, ile mam lat?”
links.belarusian: "Кім, як ты думаеш, колькі мне гадоў?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Huh?" The lieutenant isn't quite s..."
links.english: "Huh?" The lieutenant isn't quite sure he heard you.
links.polish: „Hm?” – porucznik nie jest pewien, czy dobrze usłyszał.
links.belarusian: "Гм?" – лейтэнант не ўпэўнены, ці добра пачуў.

links.title: You: ""How old do I look?""
links.english: "How old do I look?"
links.polish: „Na ile lat wyglądam?”
links.belarusian: "На колькі гадоў выглядаю?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""How old? Fifty-eight.""
links.english: "How old? Fifty-eight."
links.polish: „Ile lat? Pięćdziesiąt osiem”.
links.belarusian: "Колькі гадоў? Пяцьдзесят восем".

links.title: You: ""Oh my god, that's really old -- re..."
links.english: "Oh my god, that's really old -- really?"
links.polish: „Boże, to naprawdę dużo. Serio?”
links.belarusian: "Божа, гэта сапраўды шмат. Сур'ёзна?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You asked." He shrugs."
links.english: "You asked." He shrugs.
links.polish: „Sam spytałeś” – wzrusza ramionami.
links.belarusian: "Сам спытаў", — паціскае плячыма.

links.title: You: ""Maybe you're wrong. You were wrong..."
links.english: "Maybe you're wrong. You were wrong about the deceased too, he was *way* younger."
links.polish: „Może się mylisz. Co do denata też się myliłeś, był *o wiele* młodszy”.
links.belarusian: "Можа, ты памыляешся. Што да нябожчыка, то таксама памыляўся, ён быў *значна* маладзейшы".

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""He was *deceased*. He had been dec..."
links.english: "He was *deceased*. He had been decomposing for a week."
links.polish: „Był *martwy*. Rozkładał się od tygodnia”.
links.belarusian: "Быў *мёртвы*. Разкладаўся цэлы тыдзень".

links.title: You: ""I feel like I've been decomposing..."
links.english: "I feel like I've been decomposing for longer than that."
links.polish: „Mam wrażenie, że ja się rozkładam jeszcze dłużej”.
links.belarusian: "Маю ўражанне, што я раскладаюся яшчэ даўжэй".

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""On the bright side, you've been ge..."
links.english: "On the bright side, you've been getting *a lot* of exercise lately."
links.polish: „Dobra wiadomość jest taka, że ostatnimi czasy *bardzo* dużo się ruszasz”.
links.belarusian: "Добрая навіна ў тым, што апошнім часам ты *вельмі* шмат рухаешся".

links.title: You: ""Alcoholism has a similar effect on..."
links.english: "Alcoholism has a similar effect on living tissue, I hear."
links.polish: „Podobno alkoholizm ma podobny wpływ na tkanki”.
links.belarusian: "Нібыта алкагалізм мае падобны ўплыў на тканкі".

Alternate1.english: "The ravages of Al Gul are nearly as extreme as that of death itself, Lieutenant Kitsuragi."
Alternate1.polish: „Potworności, jakie zsyła Al Gul, są niemal równie niszczycielskie jak śmierć, poruczniku Kitsuragi”.
Alternate1.belarusian: "Мярзота, якую насылае Аль Гул, амаль так жа разбуральная, як смерць, лейтэнант Кіцурагi".

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "There's silence."
links.english: There's silence.
links.polish: Zapada cisza.
links.belarusian: Апускаецца цішыня.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "Then a little more."
links.english: Then a little more.
links.polish: Jeszcze trochę ciszy.
links.belarusian: Яшчэ крыху цішыні.

links.title: Empathy: "Here it comes -- mercy."
links.english: Here it comes -- mercy.
links.polish: I oto jest – miłosierdzie.
links.belarusian: І вось яно – міласэрнасць.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Sure -- you're 42." He squints. "L..."
links.english: "Sure -- you're 42." He squints. "Let's go?"
links.polish: „Dobra, masz czterdzieści dwa” – mruży oczy. „Idziemy?”
links.belarusian: "Добра, у цябе сорак два" — жмурыць вочы. "Ідзём?"

links.title: You: ""You're right. I'm probably 62. Let..."
links.english: "You're right. I'm probably 62. Let's leave it at that."
links.polish: „Masz rację, pewnie mam sześćdziesiąt dwa lata. Poprzestańmy na tym”.
links.belarusian: "Ты маеш рацыю, напэўна, мне шэсцьдзесят два гады. Спынімся на гэтым".

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I didn't say 62, I said 58." He sq..."
links.english: "I didn't say 62, I said 58." He squints, looking at you for a second.
links.polish: „Nie powiedziałem, że sześćdziesiąt dwa, tylko że pięćdziesiąt osiem” – spogląda na ciebie przez chwilę zmrużonymi oczami.
links.belarusian: "Я не казаў, што шэсцьдзясят два, толькі што пяцьдзясят восем" — паглядае на цябе на хвіліну прыжмуранымі вачыма.

links.title: You: ""What if you're wrong? We were both..."
links.english: "What if you're wrong? We were both wrong about the deceased -- he turned out to be 40!"
links.polish: „A jeśli się mylisz? Obaj nie mieliśmy racji co do denata – okazało się, że miał czterdzieści lat!”
links.belarusian: "А калі ты памыляешся? Абое мы памыліліся наконт памерлага — аказалася, што яму было сорак гадоў!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Forty-two. And he was *deceased*...."
links.english: "Forty-two. And he was *deceased*. He had been decomposing for a week."
links.polish: „Czterdzieści dwa. I był *martwy*. Rozkładał się od tygodnia”.
links.belarusian: "Сорак два. І быў *мёртвы*. Разлагадуўся цэлы тыдзень".

links.title: You: ""You're probably right. That's abou..."
links.english: "You're probably right. That's about what I look."
links.polish: „Pewnie masz rację, na tyle mniej więcej wyglądam”.
links.belarusian: "Пэўна, ты маеш рацыю, так прыкладна выглядаю".

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Actually, make that 54." He squint..."
links.english: "Actually, make that 54." He squints. "Alcoholism has severely impacted your appearance."
links.polish: „Właściwie to raczej pięćdziesiąt cztery” – mruży oczy. „Alkohol znacząco wpłynął na twój wygląd”.
links.belarusian: "На самай справе хутчэй пяцьдзясят чатыры", – прыжмурыў вочы. "Алкаголь істотна паўплываў на твой знешні выгляд".

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""And I *was* wrong about the age of..."
links.english: "And I *was* wrong about the age of the deceased. "
links.polish: „I *tak*, myliłem się co do wieku denata”.
links.belarusian: "І *так*, я памыліўся ў адносінах да ўзросту нябожчыка".

links.title: Visual Calculus: "Wait! This requires *scientific* me..."
links.english: Wait! This requires *scientific* measurements.
links.polish: Czekaj! To wymaga *naukowych* pomiarów.
links.belarusian: Пачакай! Гэта патрабуе *навуковых* вымярэнняў.

links.title: You: "Bring it on. I am not afraid of the..."
links.english: Bring it on. I am not afraid of the truth.
links.polish: No dalej. Nie obawiam się prawdy.
links.belarusian: Ну давай. Я не баюся праўды.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "To the Laboratorium!"
links.english: To the Laboratorium!
links.polish: W drogę, do laboratorium!
links.belarusian: У дарогу, у лабараторыю!

links.title: You: "I don't want to think about this an..."
links.english: I don't want to think about this anymore.
links.polish: Nie chcę o tym więcej myśleć.
links.belarusian: Я не хачу больш пра гэта думаць.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "Okay. Seek not the truth. Cower in..."
links.english: Okay. Seek not the truth. Cower in barbarism, you 58-year-old man-child.
links.polish: Dobrze. Nie poszukuj prawdy. Kul się jak barbarzyńca, ty pięćdziesięcioośmioletni, dorosły dzieciaku.
links.belarusian: Добра. Не шукай праўды. Скаціся як варвар, ты пяцьдзясят васьмігадовы, дарослы дзетка.

links.title: You: ""Nothing." [Finish thought.]"
links.english: "Nothing." [Finish thought.]
links.polish: „Nieważne”. [Zakończ myśl].
links.belarusian: "Неважна". [Завяршыць думку].

links.title: You: "(Turn around.) "Miss, how old do yo..."
links.english: (Turn around.) "Miss, how old do you think I am?"
links.polish: (Odwróć się). „Jak pani sądzi, ile ja mam lat?”
links.belarusian: (Павярніцеся). "Як вы думаеце, колькі мне гадоў?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Huh?" She leans in closer. "How ol..."
links.english: "Huh?" She leans in closer. "How old do I think you are?"
links.polish: „Hm?” – nachyla się bliżej. „Na ile lat mi pan wygląda?”
links.belarusian: "Хм?" – нахіляецца бліжэй. "На колькі гадоў я выглядаю?"

links.title: Rhetoric: "She's buying time to formulate the..."
links.english: She's buying time to formulate the best answer.
links.polish: Gra na czas, żeby wymyślić jak najlepszą odpowiedź.
links.belarusian: Гульня на час, каб прыдумаць як мага лепшы адказ.

links.title: Volition: "Look who's finally awake!"
links.english: Look who's finally awake!
links.polish: Proszę, kto się nagle przebudził!
links.belarusian: Калі ласка, хто раптоўна прачнуўся!

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I don't know... 40? I was like 9 w..."
links.english: "I don't know... 40? I was like 9 when OO peaked. That was, what? Nineteen years ago? I liked them when I was 9. You couldn't have liked it when you were 40..."
links.polish: „No nie wiem... Czterdzieści? Ja miałam z dziewięć, kiedy OO było na topie. A to było... ile, dziewiętnaście lat temu? Ja ich lubiłam w wieku lat dziewięciu. Pan nie mógł ich lubić, kiedy miał pan czterdzieści...”
links.belarusian: "Ну не ведаю... Сорак? Мне было каля дзевяці, калі OO было на піку. А гэта было... колькі, дзевятнаццаць гадоў таму? Я іх любіла ў дзевяцігадовым узросце. Вы не маглі іх любіць, калі вам было сорак..."

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Let's say you were twenty-somethin..."
links.english: "Let's say you were twenty-something. Twenty five. A good disco age. Twenty five plus nineteen is forty four. I'm gonna say you're 44."
links.polish: „Powiedzmy, że miał pan dwadzieścia kilka. Dwadzieścia pięć. To dobry wiek na disco. Dwadzieścia pięć plus dziewiętnaście to czterdzieści cztery. Więc moim zdaniem ma pan czterdzieści cztery lata”.
links.belarusian: "Скажам, вам было каля дваццаці. Дваццаць пяць. Гэта добры ўзрост для дыскатэкі. Дваццаць пяць плюс дзевятнаццаць — гэта сорак чатыры. Таму, па-мойму, вам сорак чатыры гады".

links.title: Logic: "Wow!"
links.english: Wow!
links.polish: O rany!
links.belarusian: Ой, Божа!

links.title: You: ""Wow.""
links.english: "Wow."
links.polish: „O rany”.
links.belarusian: "Ой, леле".

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Yeah. I have a university degree,..."
links.english: "Yeah. I have a university degree, you know." She flicks ash from her cigarette.
links.polish: „Tak. Widzi pan, mam ukończone studia” – strzepuje popiół z papierosa.
links.belarusian: "Так. Бачыце, я скончыў вучобу", — абтрэсвае попел з цыгарэты.

links.title: You: ""Forty four? I'm young!""
links.english: "Forty four? I'm young!"
links.polish: „Czterdzieści cztery? Ale jestem młody!”
links.belarusian: "Сорак чатыры? Але я малады!"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Absolutely. Age is just a number,..."
links.english: "Absolutely. Age is just a number, man."
links.polish: „No jasne. Wiek to w końcu tylko liczba”.
links.belarusian: "Ну вядома. Узрост — гэта ўрэшце рэшт толькі лічба".

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes miss, but..." The lieutenant d..."
links.english: "Yes miss, but..." The lieutenant disagrees. "For him that number is *56*."
links.polish: „Tak, proszę pani, ale...” – wyraża sprzeciw porucznik. „W jego przypadku ta liczba to *pięćdziesiąt sześć*”.
links.belarusian: "Так, спадарыня, але..." — выказвае пярэчанне лейтэнант. "У ягоным выпадку гэтая лічба — *пяцьдзясят шэсць*".

links.title: You: ""Forty four? You think so?""
links.english: "Forty four? You think so?"
links.polish: „Czterdzieści cztery? Tak pani myśli?”
links.belarusian: "Сорак чатыры? Так пані думае?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Look -- at the end of the day, age..."
links.english: "Look -- at the end of the day, age is just a number, you know."
links.polish: „Wie pan, koniec końców wiek jest tylko liczbą”.
links.belarusian: "Ведаеце, у рэшце рэшт узрост гэта толькі лічба".

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I don't know... As old as time its..."
links.english: "I don't know... As old as time itself? *Ageless*? Fifty-thousand years old? I don't know what I'm supposed to say? How old *is* an Apocalypse Cop?"
links.polish: „No nie wiem... Tyle, ile liczy sobie czas? *Bezwiecznie*? Pięćdziesiąt tysięcy? Nie wiem, co mam powiedzieć. Ile lat *może mieć* apokaliptyczny glina?”
links.belarusian: "Ну, не ведаю... Столькі, колькі налічвае час? *Бясконца*? Пяцьдзесят тысяч? Не ведаю, што сказаць. Колькі гадоў *можа быць* апакаліптычны паліцэйскі?"

links.title: You: ""I think I'm circa 55.""
links.english: "I think I'm circa 55."
links.polish: „Mam chyba około pięćdziesięciu pięciu”.
links.belarusian: "Маю, напэўна, каля пяцідзесяці пяці".

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You're not." He's squinting at you..."
links.english: "You're not." He's squinting at you.
links.polish: „Nie masz” – patrzy na ciebie zmrużonymi oczami.
links.belarusian: "У цябе няма" – глядзіць на цябе пражмуранымі вачыма.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Sure he is. You know, age is just..."
links.english: "Sure he is. You know, age is just a number."
links.polish: „Jasne, że ma. Wie pan, wiek to tylko liczba”.
links.belarusian: "Вядома, што мае. Ведаеце, узрост – гэта толькі лічба".

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes. But for him that number is 56.""
links.english: "Yes. But for him that number is 56."
links.polish: „Tak. Ale w jego przypadku ta liczba to pięćdziesiąt sześć”.
links.belarusian: "Так. Але ў яго выпадку гэтая лічба — пяцьдзясят шэсць".

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""That's pretty much it, but... Age..."
links.english: "That's pretty much it, but... Age is just a number anyway, you know." She extinguishes her cigarette.
links.polish: „To by pasowało, ale... Wie pan, wiek to tylko liczba” – gasi papierosa.
links.belarusian: "Гэта б падыходзіла, але... Вы ведаеце, узрост - гэта толькі лічба" — гасіць цыгарэту.

links.title: You: ""I think I'm circa 45.""
links.english: "I think I'm circa 45."
links.polish: „Mam chyba około czterdziestu pięciu”.
links.belarusian: "Маю, мабыць, прыкладна сорак пяць."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You're not." He's squinting at you..."
links.english: "You're not." He's squinting at you.
links.polish: „Nie masz” – patrzy na ciebie zmrużonymi oczami.
links.belarusian: "Ты не маеш" – глядзіць на цябе прыплюшчанымі вачыма.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Sure he is. You know, age is just..."
links.english: "Sure he is. You know, age is just a number."
links.polish: „Jasne, że ma. Wie pan, wiek to tylko liczba”.
links.belarusian: "Вядома, што мае. Ведаеце, узрост — гэта проста лічба".

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes. But for him that number is hi..."
links.english: "Yes. But for him that number is higher than 45."
links.polish: „Tak. Ale w jego przypadku ta liczba jest wyższa niż czterdzieści pięć”.
links.belarusian: "Так. Але ў ягоным выпадку гэтая лічба вышэйшая за сорак пяць".

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Sure, yeah. And if you're not -- a..."
links.english: "Sure, yeah. And if you're not -- age is just a number anyway."
links.polish: „Tak, jasne. A jeśli nawet nie, to wiek jest w końcu tylko liczbą”.
links.belarusian: "Так, канешне. А калі нават не, дык узрост у рэшце рэшт усяго толькі лічба".

links.title: You: ""I think I'm circa 35.""
links.english: "I think I'm circa 35."
links.polish: „Mam chyba około trzydziestu pięciu”.
links.belarusian: "Мне, напэўна, каля трыццаці пяці".

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You're not." He's squinting at you..."
links.english: "You're not." He's squinting at you.
links.polish: „Nie masz” – patrzy na ciebie zmrużonymi oczami.
links.belarusian: "Не маеш", – глядзіць на цябе прыжмуранымі вачыма.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Sure he is. You know. Age is just..."
links.english: "Sure he is. You know. Age is just a number."
links.polish: „Jasne, że ma. Wie pan, wiek to tylko liczba”.
links.belarusian: "Канешне, мае. Вы ведаеце, узрост – гэта толькі лічба".

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes. But for him that number is *m..."
links.english: "Yes. But for him that number is *much* larger than 35."
links.polish: „Tak. Ale w jego przypadku ta liczba jest *dużo* wyższa niż trzydzieści pięć”.
links.belarusian: "Так. Але ў яго выпадку гэтая лічба *значна* вышэй за трыццаць пяць".

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""Sure. Age is just a number, you kn..."
links.english: "Sure. Age is just a number, you know." She extinguishes her cigarette. "It's all in your *head*."
links.polish: „Jasne. Wie pan, wiek to tylko liczba” – gasi papierosa. „Istnieje tylko w pana *głowie*”.
links.belarusian: "Вядома. Ведаеце, узрост — гэта толькі лічба", — тушыць цыгарэту. "Ён існуе толькі ў вашай *галаве*".

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I don't know... 80? One hundred? O..."
links.english: "I don't know... 80? One hundred? One year old? I don't know what I'm supposed to say? How old is the *sorriest* age?"
links.polish: „No nie wiem... Osiemdziesiąt? Sto? Rok? Nie wiem, co mam powiedzieć. Jaki wiek jest najbardziej *żałosny*?”
links.belarusian: "Ну, я не ведаю... Восемдзесят? Сто? Год? Я не ведаю, што сказаць. Які ўзрост самы *жаласны*?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I don't know... one? Two? I don't..."
links.english: "I don't know... one? Two? I don't know what I'm supposed to say? How old is a newborn cop who doesn't remember he's a cop?"
links.polish: „No nie wiem... Rok? Dwa? Co mam powiedzieć? Ile lat ma policyjny noworodek, który nie pamięta, że jest gliną?”
links.belarusian: "Ну не ведаю... Год? Два? Што мне сказаць? Колькі гадоў мае паліцэйскі немаўлятка, якое не памятае, што яно паліцыянт?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I don't know... one million years..."
links.english: "I don't know... one million years old? Twenty-one? Seventeen? How old are superstar police officers usually?"
links.polish: „No nie wiem... Milion lat? Dwadzieścia jeden? Siedemnaście? Ile lat mają zwykle policyjne supergwiazdy?”
links.belarusian: "Ну, ня ведаю... Мільён гадоў? Дваццаць адзін? Семнаццаць? Колькі гадоў звычайна маюць паліцэйскія суперкруты?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I don't know... Twenty-one? Sevent..."
links.english: "I don't know... Twenty-one? Seventeen? Sixteen? When does the male libido peak?"
links.polish: „No nie wiem... Dwadzieścia jeden? Siedemnaście? Szesnaście? W jakim wieku libido jest u mężczyzn najwyższe?”
links.belarusian: "Ну не ведаю... Дваццаць адзін? Семнаццаць? Шаснаццаць? У якім узросце лібіда ў мужчын найбольшае?"

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""I don't know... Forty-one? Forty-f..."
links.english: "I don't know... Forty-one? Forty-five? What am I supposed to say? What's the most *boring* age a human being can be?"
links.polish: „No nie wiem... Czterdzieści jeden? Czterdzieści pięć? Co mam powiedzieć? Jaki jest *najnudniejszy* możliwy wiek dla człowieka?”
links.belarusian: "Ну, не ведаю... Сорак адзін? Сорак пяць? Што я павінен сказаць? Які *найбольш сумны* магчымы ўзрост для чалавека?"

links.title: You: "I got this, I got this... My age --..."
links.english: I got this, I got this... My age -- I think I'm...
links.polish: Nie ma problemu, żadnego... Mój wiek. Myślę, że mam...
links.belarusian: Няма праблемы, ніякай... Мой узрост. Думаю, што мне...

links.title: Visual Calculus: "Yes?"
links.english: Yes?
links.polish: Tak?
links.belarusian: Так?

links.title: You: "I'm old. A wizened sage who has see..."
links.english: I'm old. A wizened sage who has seen it all across *three hundred years*.
links.polish: Jestem stary. Niczym sędziwy mędrzec, który ogląda świat od *trzystu lat*.
links.belarusian: Я стары. Як стары мудрэц, які назірае за светам *трыста гадоў*.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "Yeah, but probably not though. Do y..."
links.english: Yeah, but probably not though. Do you want to know *the truth*?
links.polish: No dobra, ale to raczej nie tak. Chcesz poznać *prawdę*?
links.belarusian: Ну добра, але гэта хутчэй не так. Хочаш даведацца *праўду*?

links.title: You: "Bring it on. I am not afraid of the..."
links.english: Bring it on. I am not afraid of the truth.
links.polish: No dalej. Nie obawiam się prawdy.
links.belarusian: Ну добра. Я не баюся праўды.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "To the Laboratorium!"
links.english: To the Laboratorium!
links.polish: W drogę, do laboratorium!
links.belarusian: У дарогу, у лабараторыю!

links.title: You: "I don't want to think about this an..."
links.english: I don't want to think about this anymore.
links.polish: Nie chcę o tym więcej myśleć.
links.belarusian: Я не хачу больш пра гэта думаць.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "Okay. Seek not the truth. Cower in..."
links.english: Okay. Seek not the truth. Cower in barbarism, you 58-year-old man-child.
links.polish: Dobrze. Nie poszukuj prawdy. Kul się jak barbarzyńca, ty pięćdziesięcioośmioletni, dorosły dzieciaku.
links.belarusian: Добра. Не шукай праўды. Скручвайся, як варвар, ты пяцьдзесят васямігадовы, дарослы дзіцяк.

links.title: You: "I'm in my early thirties. A rough t..."
links.english: I'm in my early thirties. A rough thirty. I *lived it up*.
links.polish: Jestem zaraz po trzydziestce. Około trzech dyszek. Tylko że *żyłem pełną gębą*.
links.belarusian: Мне крыху за трыццаць. Каля трох дзясяткаў. Толькі што *жыццё пражыта напоўніцу*.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "You're a rough rider, but not in yo..."
links.english: You're a rough rider, but not in your early thirties. Do you want to know *the truth*?
links.polish: Twardy z ciebie zawodnik, ale nie masz trzydziestu lat. Chcesz poznać *prawdę*?
links.belarusian: Цвёрды з цябе гульняр, але ў цябе няма трыццаці гадоў. Хочаш даведацца *праўду*?

links.title: You: "Oh my god. I have no idea. Probably..."
links.english: Oh my god. I have no idea. Probably middle aged, but... but...
links.polish: Boże. Nie mam pojęcia. Pewnie jestem w średnim wieku, ale... ale...
links.belarusian: Божа. Не маю ўяўлення. Магчыма, я ў сярэднім узросце, але... але...

links.title: Visual Calculus: "Do you want to know the truth?"
links.english: Do you want to know the truth?
links.polish: Chcesz poznać prawdę?
links.belarusian: Хочаш даведацца праўду?

links.title: You: "[Discard thought.]"
links.english: [Discard thought.]
links.polish: [Odrzuć myśl].
links.belarusian: [Адкінь думку].
